page.title: 09INDUSTRY
page.content: Marley is an organisation operating in many parts of the world.World-Wide sales for the group in the year ending 31st of December 1982 totalled Â£444.8 million.Marley supplies a wide range of goods not always related to building and homecare.They specialize in DO-IT-YOURSELF products. Marley has a work force of 500 employees and approximately 150,000 square feet of production area.Marley Foam Limited is very proud of its position as a major supplier of custom moulded products. The second largest industry is Lenham Storage.It consists of 3 companies ,Freight Flow,Lenham Garages and Lenham Storage.Lenham Storage has 18 warehouses and no.13 has a ghost in it. They have about 250 people working there with 35 lorries and 80
